Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, north of the Circle-Bar Cattle Ranch.
Room.LongDescription: The large cattle ranch survives relatively well, considering the fact that it lies only a few yards away from the Allisk Manor. Not being one for superstition, the cattle ranchers usually ignore the idle threats and curses the other ranchers sling at them for being so relaxed in their defenses. Nonetheless, they alway have a few cloves of garlic on hand just in case.
